newsitem.title: LATVIA: BOURSE GIVES UNIBANKA ASSET DETAILS.
newsitem.headline: BOURSE GIVES UNIBANKA ASSET DETAILS.

text.p: The stock exchange on Tuesday gave details of Unibanka's assets and liabilities after earlier saying its first-half profit was 3.185 million lats.

The bourse said in a statement that Unibanka had accounts with the central bank of 14.13 million lats, government T-bills of 37.09 million lats and claims on other credit institutions of 41.97 million lats.
On the liabilities side, the bourse said that the bank had commitments to other credit institutions of 8.8 million lats, other commitments of 13.76 million lats and own capital of 29.28 million lats.
